definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: Coriolis acceleration is a nodus in general mechanics.
sentences.chinese: 科里奧利加速度在普通物理力學中是一難點。

sentences.english: This paper discusses the static model of a multi-finger micromechanical accelerometer.
sentences.chinese: 討論了一種梳齒式微機械加速度計的靜態模型。

sentences.english: It features a modern dual-axis accelerometer to track the magnitude of your movements.
sentences.chinese: 它配備了現代雙軸加速度跟蹤的嚴重性你的動作。

sentences.english: That's the tension and this is the acceleration.
The ground-shaking is measured by ground acceleration.
sentences.chinese: 地面的震動可通過地面加速度來測量。

sentences.english: The acceleration needed to accomplish this implies ag-force of 14 million times Earth's gravity.
sentences.chinese: 而需要克服的加速度是重力加速度的1千4百萬倍。

sentences.english: The acceleration needed to accomplish this implies ag-force of 14 million times Earth's gravity.
sentences.chinese: 而需要克服的加速度是重力加速度的1千4百萬倍。

sentences.english: All spacemen must be able to bear acceleration.
sentences.chinese: 所有太空人都應能承受加速度。

sentences.english: Test the accelerometers which is fixed in three-axis rotary table on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 第三，在地面進行加速度計的三軸轉檯實驗。

sentences.english: We obtained also the relation between gravity and the phase difference of the atom gravimeter.
sentences.chinese: 得到了原子重力儀的相位差與重力加速度的關係。

sentences.english: 5g That means the acceleration upwards is 2.5g.
sentences.chinese: 而這意味着向上加速度爲2。

sentences.english: The peak acceleration must not exceed 250G for any of the impacts.
sentences.chinese: 峯值加速度不得超過250G的任何的影響。

sentences.english: Then set the current base to the existing level of acceleration.
sentences.chinese: 然後將當前的基數設爲現有的加速度級別。

sentences.english: It is shown that the proper acceleration of null geodesic with conjugate points approaches infinity.
sentences.chinese: 具有共軛點的類光測地線的固有加速度趨於無窮大。

sentences.english: A novel non-contact fiber optic accelerometer is presented.
sentences.chinese: 介紹一種新型光纖非接觸加速度計。

sentences.english: If the acceleration goes down, the period of oscillation goes up.
sentences.chinese: 如果加速度減小，振盪週期變大。

definition: speed at the end of the trajectory/speed in the final stage
